help: Game commands:*(U)SE: Use item. Combine adding (W)ITH*(L)OOK: Examine an item*(P)ICK: Pick up an item*(O)PEN: Open an item*(T)ALK: Talk with someone*(I)NVENTORY: Show your inventory**Move around with:*(N)ORTH, (S)OUTH, (E)AST, (W)EST**System commands:*HELP: This guide*LOAD: Load saved game*SAVE: Save current game
